kDesc
So that's why Whimsy Hollow looked so bare! That grateful Whimsy you found has returned this family heirloom he "borrowed". [#Legal]
Voilà pourquoi Whimsy Hollow semblait si vide ! Ce Whimsy reconnaissant que vous avez retrouvé a rendu cet héritage familial qu'il avait « emprunté ». [#Legal]
Deshalb sah Whimsy Hollow so leer aus! Der dankbare Whimsy, den du gefunden hast, hat dieses Familienerbstück, das er nur "ausgeliehen" hatte, wieder zurückgegeben. [#Legal]
Ecco perché la Tana Stravagante sembrava così spoglia! Il Whimsy riconoscente che hai trovato ha restituito questo cimelio di famiglia che aveva "preso in prestito". [#Legal]
¡Por eso la Madriguera Whimsy estaba tan vacía! Este agradecido Whimsy que encontraste ha devuelto el patrimonio de su familia que "tomó prestado". [#Legal]
So that's why Whimsy Hollow looked so bare! That grateful Whimsy you found has returned this family heirloom he "borrowed". [#Legal]
So that's why Whimsy Hollow looked so bare! That grateful Whimsy you found has returned this family heirloom he "borrowed". [#Legal]
